text: to tum dekhate ho ki jin logon ke dilon mein rog hai, ve unake yahaan jaakar unake beech daud-dhoop kar rahe hai. ve kahate hai, "hamen bhay hai ki kaheen ham kisee sankat mein na grast ho jaen." to sambhav hai ki jald hee allaah (tumhe) vijay pradaan kare ya usakee or se koee aur baat prakat ho. phir to ye log jo kuchh apane jee mein chhipae hue hai, usapar lajjit honge
